name: palas-marketplace
description: Directorio de plugins de Palas: herramientas de productividad y habilidades especializadas para PYMEs

plugins.name: basic
plugins.description: AI skills for your business and projects: basic common tools that can be re-used in business or anything. Includes markdown linting and notebook watermark removal.

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: AI skills for your business and projects that are security related. Includes security scanning for secrets, vulnerabilities, and risky code patterns.

plugins.name: git
plugins.description: AI skills for your business and projects that helps you work with git. Includes well-structured commits with conventional format.

plugins.name: example-plugin
plugins.description: A comprehensive example plugin demonstrating all Claude Code extension options including commands, agents, skills, hooks, and MCP servers
